objects.description: Sowbug identified and extracted all Word documents on a server by using a command containing *.doc and *.docx. The actors also searched for documents based on a specific date range and attempted to identify all installed software on a victim. (Citation: Symantec Sowbug Nov 2017)

external_references.description: Symantec Security Response. (2017, November 7). Sowbug: Cyber espionage group targets South American and Southeast Asian governments. Retrieved November 16, 2017.
